DOC.brief_title: Study Trabodenoson Adults With Ocular Hypertension Primary Open-angle Glaucoma
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis ocular hypertension ( OHT ) primary openangle glaucoma ( POAG ) Mean Intraocular pressure ( IOP ) ≥24 ≤34 Significant visual field loss new field loss within past year Cuptodisc ratio > 0.8 Central corneal thickness < 490 µm > 610 µm A recent ( acute ) chronic medical condition might obfuscate Subject 's study data
